author: spencer_tb
content:
ðŸ§ª Fusaka Devnet-5 EEST release v2.0.0: https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/releases/tag/fusaka-devnet-5@v2.0.0

- Includes additional tests for EIP-7823, and the BPO x EIP-7918 reserve price activation on a update fraction decrease.
- Removes the Prague fixtures so this release only contains fixtures from Osaka to BPO forks @Som (OOO till 7 Sep). Prague tests will be included in the next full release very soon.
